snippet: Nigeria is one of several countries on the continent whose policies hurt gays and all Africans.
abstract: Editorial contends that African nations are leaders in the cruel and dehumanizing trend of intolerance and persecution of gays and lesbians; points to ban on same-sex relationships signed into law in Nigeria as one of the most significant setbacks to gay rights on the continent.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria is one of several countries on the continent whose policies hurt gays and all Africans.
